attributes.action: NATIONWIDE campaign against  the  unfair new universal credit & housing benefit reforms
attributes.additional_details: NATIONWIDE  CAMPAIGN against the universal credit & housing benefit reforms. TO SEEK a government review that does not further PENALISE the un-employed/ disabled/single parents/low income families that are already struggling with the benefit system & low income already in place,& are not faced with the prospect of living on THE POVERTY LINE.
